stories.Title: That was a good scare!
stories.Description: The wait is finally over, so we can now see what Apple meant by "scary fast." It's nothing more and nothing less than the M3 chip, and here's all you must know about it.
stories.Tweet: That was a good scare! 📦 The wait is finally over, so we can now see what Apple meant by "scary fast." It's nothing more and nothing less than the M3 chip, and here's all you must know about it. #apple https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/10/everything-to-know-about-apples-new-m3-m3-pro-and-m3-max-processors/

stories.Title: More about Optimus
stories.Description: Again, job listings provide insights into Tesla's headquarters. This time, it appears they're progressing with the Optimus program. Will we receive more updates on the robot soon?
stories.Tweet: More about Optimus 📦 Again, job listings provide insights into Tesla's headquarters. This time, it appears they're progressing with the Optimus program. Will we receive more updates on the robot soon? #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/10/31/tesla-ramps-up-hiring-humanoid-robot-reinforcement-learning/

stories.Title: Innovation and opportunity
stories.Description: Quora's new approach allows bot creators to earn from their AI efforts, making their chatbot Poe the ultimate platform for bringing ideas to life.
stories.Tweet: Innovation and opportunity 📦 Quora's new approach allows bot creators to earn from their AI efforts, making their chatbot Poe the ultimate platform for bringing ideas to life. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/10/31/quoras-poe-introduces-an-ai-chatbot-creator-economy/

stories.Title: Meet your captain
stories.Description: AI could hold the key to safer flights. Developed by MIT scientists and powered by Liquid Neural Networks, Air-Guardian can detect critical situations that pilots might overlook.
stories.Tweet: Meet your captain 📦 AI could hold the key to safer flights. Developed by MIT scientists and powered by Liquid Neural Networks, Air-Guardian can detect critical situations that pilots might overlook. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/mit-copilot-system-can-set-the-stage-for-a-new-wave-of-ai-innovation/

stories.Title: Mice on the ISS
stories.Description: Researchers have achieved a monumental feat with the successful growth of mouse embryos aboard the ISS, bringing us one step closer to human reproduction in space.
stories.Tweet: Mice on the ISS 📦 Researchers have achieved a monumental feat with the successful growth of mouse embryos aboard the ISS, bringing us one step closer to human reproduction in space. #science https://www.space.com/international-space-station-mouse-embryo-reproduction

stories.Title: Next stop: Venus
stories.Description: Rocket Lab has its sights set on Venus with the privately funded Venus Life Finder mission, which aims to explore the planet's clouds for organic compounds.
stories.Tweet: Next stop: Venus 📦 Rocket Lab has its sights set on Venus with the privately funded Venus Life Finder mission, which aims to explore the planet's clouds for organic compounds. #space https://spacenews.com/rocket-lab-plans-late-2024-launch-of-venus-mission/

stories.Title: The road to Dinkinesh
stories.Description: Lucy's journey of millions of miles is about to reach its destination. This Wednesday, NASA's spacecraft will reveal all about the asteroid Dinkinesh.
stories.Tweet: The road to Dinkinesh 📦 Lucy's journey of millions of miles is about to reach its destination. This Wednesday, NASA's spacecraft will reveal all about the asteroid Dinkinesh. #space https://gizmodo.com/nasa-lucy-flyby-asteroid-dinkinesh-jupiter-trojans-1850974022

stories.Title: A cosmic ghost?
stories.Description: NASA has left us with an intriguing Halloween treat. This stunning visual, captured by the Chandra X-Ray Observatory and IXPE, resembles a haunting hand far away in space. Take a close look!
stories.Tweet: A cosmic ghost? 📦 NASA has left us with an intriguing Halloween treat. This stunning visual, captured by the Chandra X-Ray Observatory and IXPE, resembles a haunting hand far away in space. Take a close look! #space https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/nasa-releases-ghostly-cosmic-hand-image-for-halloween/

stories.Title: Empower your projects
stories.Description: GitHub's Alireza Goudarzi and Albert Ziegler provide a roadmap to success in LLM app development. Take a dive into this article and start building your own applications today.

stories.Title: Time for affordable mobility
stories.Description: Stellantis is ready to embrace the electric vehicle future. In addition to complementing their current product line, they also plan on delivering affordable EVs and advanced technology.
stories.Tweet: Time for affordable mobility 📦 Stellantis is ready to embrace the electric vehicle future. In addition to complementing their current product line, they also plan on delivering affordable EVs and advanced technology. #electricvehicles https://electrek.co/2023/10/31/jeep-ram-owner-launching-affordable-evs-next-year/

title: Apple's M3 chip, Microgravity breakthroughs, Poe is for creators
description: Happy Halloween! So, after a few days of wondering what exactly was the thrill behind Apple's spooky surprise event, we've got some answers. Space babies? Well apparently, there's a slim chance that humans will be able to reproduce in space – they're testing it out with mice first. And hey, if you're into AI and plan to monetize your talent, Quora's chatbot has your back.
